reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

description.narrative: The second summit of the civil society version 2014 will be in the Quinta Normal Park on Saturday October 11 and will aim to celebrate and make visible the social power of civil society. Its central concept will showcase the significance of organized civil society its diversity and its importance in the political and social process in Chile. It seeks to create a place of meeting. It will seek to raise concerns about the role of Chilean civil society in the context of major reforms that Chile is facing (new constitution education and tax reform etc.). As part of Populusaurio 2014 some of the specific objectives are: ? Strengthen the joint to joint work between civil society and civil society organizations. ? Promote dialogue and institutionalization of partic ipatory mechanisms and state-civil society collaboration. ? Conduct an annual summit of organized civil society. ? Make visible the work of civil society organizations.
